Uses of Package
org.resthub.core.context.config

  • Packages that use org.resthub.core.context.config 
    Package Description
    org.resthub.core.context.config
    Provides helpers to scan annotations to add them in RESThub context
    org.resthub.core.context.config.db  
    org.resthub.core.context.config.jaxb
    Context scanning implementation for JAXB elements
    org.resthub.core.context.config.persistence
    Context scanning implementation for JPA2 entities
  • Classes in org.resthub.core.context.config used by org.resthub.core.context.config 
    Class and Description
    AbstractClassPathScanner
    This class defines and perform scanning for resources specified configurations.
    ResthubBeanDefinitionParser
    This interface must be implemented by any BeanDefinitionParser to be autodetected by ResthubNamespaceHandler.
  • Classes in org.resthub.core.context.config used by org.resthub.core.context.config.db 
    Class and Description
    ResthubBeanDefinitionParser
    This interface must be implemented by any BeanDefinitionParser to be autodetected by ResthubNamespaceHandler.
  • Classes in org.resthub.core.context.config used by org.resthub.core.context.config.jaxb 
    Class and Description
    AbstractClassPathScanner
    This class defines and perform scanning for resources specified configurations.
    AbstractParser
    This class provide utilities for resources scanning defined by a scanning configuration in application context.
    ResthubBeanDefinitionParser
    This interface must be implemented by any BeanDefinitionParser to be autodetected by ResthubNamespaceHandler.
